name: onetep
description: meta info used by the EP parser, all names are expected to start with onetep_

metaInfos.name: geometry_optimization_frequency_tol
metaInfos.description: Specifies the estimated average phonon frequency (as an energy) used to initialize the inverse Hessian matrix for geometry optimization. (eV))

metaInfos.name: geometry_optimization_geometry_conv_win
metaInfos.description: geom optim number of consecutive iterations during which convergence must be met

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_atom_forces
metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_total, including forces' unitary-transformation (rigid body) filtering and including constraints, if present. The derivatives with respect to displacements of the nuclei in the gradient are evaluated according to the coordinate system defined in coordinate_system. In addition, these forces are obtained by filtering out the unitary transformations (translations of the center of mass and rigid rotations of the whole system, when non periodic), atom_forces_raw for the unfiltered counterpart. Furthermore, forces due to constraints like fixed atoms, distances, angles, dihedrals, and so on, are here included (see atom_forces_raw for the unfiltered counterpart).

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_atom_positions
metaInfos.description: Storing atomic positions in fractional coordinates

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_basis_set_planewave_cutoff
metaInfos.description: Temporary storing plane wave cutoff as string

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_basis_set_planewave_cutoff_iteration_0
metaInfos.description: cutoff at iteration 0 of geometry optimisation

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_crystal_point_group
metaInfos.description: Point group of the crystal (Schoenflies notation)

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_dispersion_correction
metaInfos.description: Dispersion correction to the final SCF energy

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_energy_total_scf_iteration_list
metaInfos.description: Total electronic energy calculated with XC_method_scf during the scf iterations is stored in a list

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_functional_type
metaInfos.description: XC functional definition in onetep convention

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_functional_weight
metaInfos.description: XC functional weight in onetep convention

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_geom_iteration_index
metaInfos.description: Index for number of iterations in geometry optimisation

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_ir
metaInfos.description: Irreducible representation in the Point Group

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_ir_store
metaInfos.description: Irreducible representation in the Point Group

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_is_smearing
metaInfos.description: Turns on the smeared ion representation for electrostatics calculation.

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_kernel_diis_lshift
metaInfos.description: Value of the shift in energy of the conduction bands with the level-shifting technique during the inner loop DIIS. Reference:

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_max_iter_store
metaInfos.description: Number of maximum iterations steps store

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_number_of_scf_iterations_store
metaInfos.description: number of scf iterations in single point calculation

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_optimised_atom_positions
metaInfos.description: Storing atomic optimised positions in fractional coordinates

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_pbc_cutoff
metaInfos.description: onetep_pbc cutoff for effect of open boundary

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_store_raman_tensor
metaInfos.description: Temporary storing converged Raman susceptibility tensor

metaInfos.name: x_onetep_total_dispersion_corrected_energy
metaInfos.description: Total electronic energy that includes dispersion energy computed with Disp_method_name not corrected for finite basis-set
